item.title: How to clone a libvirt VM controlled by Vagrant
item.description: Strangely enough, googling about this problem doesn’t produce any meaningful results. So here are steps which allow cloning a libvirt VM controlled by Vagrant. Imagine that you have a VM named testvm1 which you want to clone into testvm2. Shutdown all VMs with vagrant halt or at least from inside of VM with sudo shutdown -h 0. Figure our real VM name with virsh list --all | grep testvm1.
